ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Do they hear you when you call
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Abraham) asked: "Do they hear when you call them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He asked: "Do they hear you when you call them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They replied, "We worship idols and shall continue to worship them".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Do they hear you when you call?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Do they hear you when you call"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Do they hear you when you call?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Do they hear you when you call,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Do they hear you when ye cry?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He asked, "Do they hear you when you call to them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: hearken they unto you when ye cry?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Do they hear you when you call them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Do they listen to you when ye call (on them)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Do they hear you, when you call (on them)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do they hear you when you call on them' He asked.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Do they hear you when you pray?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Do they hear you when you supplicate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:72] He said, ‘Do they hear you when you supplicate?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Abraham said to them: (Do they hear you when ye cry) do these deities answer you when you call upon them?
